</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 79, [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 34</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>1 minute (Interact)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Astrolabes can be used for navigation in unfamiliar or featureless locations. To use an astrolabe, the holder must be trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). By spending 1 minute to measure the height of the stars and planets, a holder who knows the time and date can determine the latitude, and a holder who knows their latitude can determine the date and time. An astrolabe also grants a +1 item bonus to checks to identify celestial bodies. A standard astrolabe functions only on steady ground.
